title: IMDC (International Metastatic RCC Database Consortium) Risk Model for Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma
desc: The IMDC (International Metastatic RCC Database Consortium) Risk Score for RCC predicts survival patients in metastatic renal cell carcinoma treated with systemic therapy.

orgreference.text: Heng DY, Xie W, Regan MM, Warren MA, Golshayan AR, Sahi C, Eigl BJ, Ruether JD, Cheng T, North S, Venner P, Knox JJ, Chi KN, Kollmannsberger C, McDermott DF, Oh WK, Atkins MB, Bukowski RM, Rini BI, Choueiri TK. Prognostic Factors for Overall Survival in Patients With Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Treated With Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor–Targeted Agents: Results From a Large, Multicenter Study. JCO Dec 1, 2009:5794-5799; published online on October 13, 2009.
